hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e -v
umask 0022 export PATH=$PATH:/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/update-infer/binary/infer/bin/:/var/lib/jenkins/.cargo/bin/
echo "Cleanup previous build" rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu reports/ /tmp/scan-build-*
echo "Cleanup" ./mach clobber
export MACH_NO_WRITE_TIMES=on cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug
# --disable-unified-compilation mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j20"
CXX=/data/jenkins/opt/infer-dev/infer.git/infer/lib/wrappers/g++ CC=/data/jenkins/opt/infer-dev/infer.git/infer/lib/wrappers/gcc
EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a
echo "Build using infer" infer run -o ${JOB_NAME}/ -- make clean all
! DIFF_RESULT=`diff -u ${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/${JOB_NAME}/lastSuccessful/archive/${JOB_NAME}/bugs.txt ${JOB_NAME}/bugs.txt` if test -n "$DIFF_RESULT"; then echo "$DIFF_RESULT"|mail -v -s "${JOB_NAME} changes" sylvestre@mozilla.com fi
chmod o+rx $(find ${JOB_NAME}/ -type d) chmod -R o+r ${JOB_NAME} rsync -arv -R ${JOB_NAME}/ sledru@people.mozilla.org:/home/sledru/public_html/reports/ ./mach clobber
